locations.description:
An attack that misses by 1 hits the torso instead. Only
impaling (imp), piercing (pi-, pi, pi+, pi++), and
tight-beam burning (burn) attacks can target the eye  and
only from the front or sides. Injury over HP10 blinds the
eye. Otherwise, treat as skull, but without the extra DR!

An attack that misses by 1 hits the torso instead. Wounding
modifier is x4. Knockdown rolls are at -10. Critical hits
use the Critical Head Blow Table (B556). Exception: These
special effects do not apply to toxic (tox) damage.

An attack that misses by 1 hits the torso instead. Jaw,
cheeks, nose, ears, etc. If the target has an open-faced
helmet, ignore its DR. Knockdown rolls are at -5. Critical
hits use the Critical Head Blow Table (B556). Corrosion
(cor) damage gets a x1 wounding modifier, and if it
inflicts a major wound, it also blinds one eye (both eyes on
damage over full HP). Random attacks from behind hit the
skull instead.

Reduce the wounding multiplier of large piercing (pi+), huge
piercing (pi++), and impaling (imp) damage to x1. Any major
wound (loss of over  HP from one blow) cripples the limb.
Damage beyond that threshold is lost.

Reduce the wounding multiplier of large piercing (pi+), huge
piercing (pi++), and impaling (imp) damage to x1. Any major
wound (loss of over  HP from one blow) cripples the limb.
Damage beyond that threshold is lost. If holding a shield,
double the penalty to hit: -4 for shield arm instead of -2.

An attack that misses by 1 hits the torso instead. Human
males and the males of similar species suffer double shock
from crushing (cr) damage, and get -5 to knockdown rolls.
Otherwise, treat as a torso hit.

Reduce the wounding multiplier of large piercing (pi+), huge
piercing (pi++), and impaling (imp) damage to x1. Any major
wound (loss of over  HP from one blow) cripples the limb.
Damage beyond that threshold is lost. If holding a shield,
double the penalty to hit: -4 for shield arm instead of -2.

Reduce the wounding multiplier of large piercing (pi+), huge
piercing (pi++), and impaling (imp) damage to x1. Any major
wound (loss of over  HP from one blow) cripples the limb.
Damage beyond that threshold is lost.

If holding a shield, double the penalty to hit: -8 for
shield hand instead of -4. Reduce the wounding multiplier of
large piercing (pi+), huge piercing (pi++), and impaling
(imp) damage to x1. Any major wound (loss of over  HP
from one blow) cripples the extremity. Damage beyond that
threshold is lost.

Reduce the wounding multiplier of large piercing (pi+), huge
piercing (pi++), and impaling (imp) damage to x1. Any major
wound (loss of over  HP from one blow) cripples the
extremity. Damage beyond that threshold is lost.

An attack that misses by 1 hits the torso instead. Neck and
throat. Increase the wounding multiplier of crushing (cr)
and corrosion (cor) attacks to x1, and that of cutting
(cut) damage to x2. At the GMs option, anyone killed by a
cutting (cut) blow to the neck is decapitated!

An attack that misses by 1 hits the torso instead. Heart,
lungs, kidneys, etc. Increase the wounding modifier for an
impaling (imp) or any piercing (pi-, pi, pi+, pi++) attack
to x3. Increase the wounding modifier for a tight-beam
burning (burn) attack to x2. Other attacks cannot target the
vitals.

children.markdown:
Session 1: A group of us offered to help the boatmaster to row through the night to arrive on time, and we were beset by river pirates.   Some swam and climbed aboard the ship, and some shot arrows from the shore.  Annoying Dwarf was one of them.    The pirates weren't trying to kill (although they did kill the crows nest lookout, accidentally).   The midget bard was able to stun the dwarf (no idea how), and then went around letting the animals loose.   What an idiot.

The cat-lady figured out to throw the rug onto the fire (I have no idea how it started), and attacked one of the pirates with her claws!?!

I smashed a barrel of water over the head of some pirate, but for my troubles, I was stabbed and shot.   Ouch.   Trying to save my life, I prayed for "fog" and moved in between the cows (and made "mooing" sounds) to try to hide.

I guess the battle was going badly for the pirates because they decided to leave, all except the dwarf... who was still stunned.

They thought the boatmaster's extra gold (that he was going to pay us) was worth the effort.

I was badly hurt, so I went into the hold and prayed.   After a while, I fell asleep, and the dear Mother still healed me, somewhat.   I guess I wasn't as close to her as normal, but in any case, I still felt better.

Once we got to town, the bard heard about some inn with troubles... but I had to go find the druid circle.   The ranger came with me, to pay her respects.   I found the signs and spent the night praying.   My brethren healed me up and I felt fine in the morning.

As I was leaving, "Mist" the High Druid, told about influx of Faerie and Undead.

I said I would investigate.

210601- We met up with Carlo Magnason (the bloke that hired us to work his boat on his journey to get married), offered us a new job.     Escort him to the "frontier" city of Skogurenda.

The "king" said that if you can "homestead" the land, you will be name Jarl.     Carlo paid us each $200 and we went.

At the city, we were met by "Inga" the guard, who asked us to pay for entrance into the city.   We each donated $5.

The city is run by Dalmar (D) and there is some kind of festival tomorrow.    We look for a tavern/bar and notice a few men building a wrestling "cage".    They fight, and one takes it too far and hurts his friend's shoulder.   I bandage it as best I can, and run after the guy.   He is angry at his friend... weird.

We walk to the market area, and a bunch of dogs come running across the market.    They are rabid (or so it seems).   We do our best to protect ourselves from the dogs, and have to put them down.     I try my best to talk with one... but it is totally out of its mind.

A gent named Tobias comes out and thanks us... and says he can get us in with Dalmar.

notes.markdown:
1 gallon of water per person per day.
1 food ration per day.
4 pack ponies ($1600/each).  Carry limit 175 lbs.
5 gallon barrel of water: 60lbs ($65)
Each pony can carry 2 barrels (120lbs) with 55 lbs left over for rations and loot!

Wish List:
Balanaced Fine Spear (+1 to hit, +1 damage) $280
